AI Description: Pythia is a software package for event generation for high-energy collisions, implementing a number of hard scattering models for hadron collisions. It is commonly used in theoretical physics and high-energy physics research.
Core Features: Event generation for high-energy collisions, implementation of hard scattering models, simulation of hadron collisions.
General Tags: Event Generation, High-Energy Collisions, Theoretical Physics, Particle Physics
